data.message: Dear Facebook, please don't access everything on my personal device with each upgrade. I can't wait for the next Facebook version to have LESS permissions!

replies.message: Hi Michael. Your trust is important to us, which is why we only share personal information we receive about you with others if we have received your permission or as described in our Data Use Policy. Learn more at:http://on.fb.me/1cnawuf -Sarah
I have purchased a business and need to have the former owners business facebook page removed, how can I do this?
How do I not give you permission to share? I found my personal profile pic on a public site
How come some of my comments are grey? Flagging feature?
